name: dungeon-together
description: A multiplayer WebGL HTML5 dungeon game

scripts.build: npm run build:release & npm run build:stage & npm run build:test & npm run build:release:docs
scripts.build:release: npm run build:release:client & npm run build:release:server & npm run build:release:server
scripts.build:release:client: npm run build:release:rollup && rollup --config build/release/bin/rollup/release.client.js && mkdirp build/release/artifacts/terser && terser build/release/artifacts/rollup/client.js --compress --mangle --beautify --output build/release/artifacts/terser/client.js && mkdirp build/release/client && ncp build/release/artifacts/terser/client.js build/release/client/index.js
scripts.build:stage: npm run build:stage:client & npm run build:stage:server & npm run build:stage:server && npm run build:stage:standalone
scripts.build:stage:client: npm run build:stage:rollup && rollup --config build/stage/bin/rollup/stage.client.js && mkdirp build/stage/client && terser build/stage/artifacts/rollup/client.js --compress --mangle --output build/stage/client/index.js --source-map content=inline && echo //# sourceMappingURL=index.js.map >> build/stage/client/index.js
scripts.build:stage:standalone: npm run build:stage:standalone:html && npm run build:stage:standalone:img && npm run build:stage:standalone:js
scripts.build:stage:standalone:img: mkdirp build/stage/standalone && ncp include/dungeon-together-assets/build/img build/stage/standalone/img && ncp src/img build/stage/standalone/img
scripts.build:stage:standalone:js: npm run build:stage:rollup && rollup --config build/stage/bin/rollup/stage.standalone.js && mkdirp build/stage/standalone/js && terser build/stage/artifacts/rollup/standalone.js --compress --mangle --output build/stage/standalone/js/index.js --source-map content=inline && echo //# sourceMappingURL=index.js.map >> build/stage/standalone/js/index.js
scripts.codacy: npm run coverage && cross-cat coverage/lcov.info | codacy-coverage
scripts.junit: npm run build && mocha test --reporter mocha-junit-reporter

author: cpuabuse.com
